name: Browser Search
description: Search the web for information using advanced research capabilities. This tool leverages GPT-OSS browser tools to find relevant web content.
author: DurgasAI

input_parameters.name: query
input_parameters.description: Search query to find information on the web

input_parameters.name: topn
input_parameters.description: Number of top results to return (default: 10)

output_parameters.name: results
output_parameters.description: Search results with URLs, titles, and snippets
